/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/cross_library_execution.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/cross_library_execution.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -o cross_library_execution   -L/usr/local/cuda-10.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-10.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/arrayfire/lib64 libcross_library.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenCL.so /opt/arrayfire/lib64/libafcuda.so.3.7.2 -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
